info.description: Servicio para consultar el parque unificado de clientes
info.title: Parque Unificado

get.summary: Retrieve list of products in inventory

parameters.name: billingAccount.id
parameters.description: To obtain the list of products stored in the server that are associated to a given account

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: To retrieve only subproducts until a certain level. Must be 1 or greater. Depth=1 means the root product does not contain productRelationship, depth=2 means the level 1 products (root's children) do not contain productRelationship... If not sent, maximum depth is assumed

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: To limit the amount of results

parameters.name: nationalId
parameters.description: To obtain the list of products matching to a given legal identification value. Typically used combined with nationalIdType

parameters.name: nationalIdType
parameters.description: To obtain the list of products matching to a given legal identification type (e.g.: DNI, passport, social security number, RUT, CPF, driver's license, etc.). This is typically combined with nationalID to query for specific identity

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: To get the results starting from an offset value. Use for pagination

parameters.name: publicId
parameters.description: to obtain the list of products associated with a given public identifier (e.g.: an msisdn subscription id)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: To obtain the list of products stored in the server that are of a given type

get.summary: Retrieve details of a single product instance in the server

@referredType.description: Type of referred account e.g.: financial account, billing accountâ€¦

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the account resource in the server

AccountRefType.title: AccountRefType
AccountRefType.description: Reference to an external account that can be queried with the Account Management API.

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the category detailed information

subcategories.description: Next level of categories allocated to the component, intended to allow additional segmentation. A product offering may belong to more than one category/subcategory

additionalData.description: Any additional metadata that the application may supply (implementation and application specific). The metadata are in the form of name-value pairs. It is recommended not to use this parameter and request new information elements to be added in the structure definition. Next releases of the T-Open API will not include support for this additionalData parameter because it has been detected that the extensibility function is not helping the stability of the standard definition of APIs

description.description: A human readable pricing short description

id.description: A unique identifier for the pricing model

isMandatory.description: Indicates if the pricing model must be always included as part of the offering

name.description: A human readable pricing model name

price.description: Base value applied to the price model offering (without taxes). This could refer to a charge, a discount or an allowance

priceType.description: Identification for the type of individual pricing component

prodPriceAlteration.description: An amount, usually of money, that modifies a price charged for a Product

recurringChargePeriod.description: Identification for the recurring charging periodicity in the case of recurring pricing models (e.g.: â€œmonthlyâ€, â€œyearlyâ€,â€¦)

taxIncluded.description: Indication if the price is with taxes (true) or without (false)

taxRate.description: Taxes (in percentage) applied to the individual pricing component

taxType.description: Indication on the type of tax applied (e.g. â€œVATâ€, â€œIVAâ€, â€¦)

unitOfMeasure.description: Indication of the criteria to be used for the charging (e.g.: â€œper minuteâ€, â€œper secondâ€, â€œper GBâ€, â€œper 50GBâ€, â€œper licenseâ€, â€œper subscription to offeringâ€â€¦)

latitude.description: Geographical longitude of the location.  If value is not available by server then the string  can indicate Ã¢â‚¬ËœUNAVAILABLEÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ or something similar.

longitude.description: Geographical latitude of the location.  If value is not available by server then the    string can indicate Ã¢â‚¬ËœUNAVAILABLEÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ or something similar.

@referredType.description: Indicates the type of the resource referenced for extensibility/polimorphic purposes of the specific entity (individual/organization for customer, urban/rural for address, ...)

city.description: Local administrative name such as a city, town, municipality or council,  partido, concello, etc. that might comprise smaller entities

coordinates.description: The validity for the relation with the related object. If not included, the current date is used as starting date and no ending date is defined

entityType.description: Identifier of the type of entity that is referenced (party, address, location, site, channel, product spec, product offering, account, customer, payment, payment method ...)

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the related entity detailed information

id.description: String providing identification of the related entity reported

name.description: String providing the name of the related entity reported

role.description: Indication of the relationship defined between the entity and the order (e.g.: originator, customer, user, â€¦). Supported values are implementation and application specific

validFor.description: The validity for the relation with the related entity. If not included, the current date is used as starting date and no ending date is defined

@schemaLocation.description: This field provides a link to the schema describing the resource model for the Object defining the characteristics for an internet product

@type.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or specific object type)

valueType.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or object type)

key.description: Identifier of the specific parameter (implementation and application specific)

value.description: Value allocated to the specific parameter identified by the key name

@schemaLocation.description: This field provides a link to the schema describing the resource model for the Object defining the characteristics for an internet product

@type.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or specific object type)

valueType.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or object type)

amount.description: Current value set for the money

units.description: Definition of the currency used. It is implementation specific to define how currencies are defined, it could be defined using ISO 4217

additionalData.description: Any additional metadata that the application may supply (implementation and application specific). It is recommended not to use this parameter and request new information elements to be added in the structure definition. Next releases of the T-Open API will not include support for this additionalData parameter because it has been detected that the extensibility function is not helping the stability of the standard definition of APIs

applicationDuration.description: Duration defined as a number of instances of the recurring period to apply the alteration (e.g.: 2 months for the recurring discount)

description.description: A human readable discount short description

discountType.description: Identification for the type of discount to be applied

name.description: A human readable charging discount model name

price.description: Value of the alteration for the case of discount. This will refer to a monetary value or a percentage

priceCondition.description: Text describing the condition that triggers the alteration to be applied

priceType.description: Identification for the type of individual alteration type (recurring discount, one time discount, recurring allowance, one time allowance)

priority.description: Priority level for applying this alteration among all the defined alterations on the order item price

recurringChargePeriod.description: Identification for the recurring periodicity in the case of recurring alteration models (e.g.: â€œmonthlyâ€, â€œyearlyâ€,â€¦)

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure to apply the alteration (e.g.: â€œper 1 minuteâ€, â€œper 1 secondâ€, â€œper 1 GBâ€, â€œper 50 GBâ€, â€œper 1 licenseâ€, â€œsubscriptionâ€,â€¦)

validFor.description: The validity for the discount model If not included, the current date is used as starting date and no ending date is defined

@type.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or specific object type)

valueType.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or object type)

additionalData.description: Any further information needed by the server to fill the product definition (implementation and application specific) in the form of name-value pairs. It is recommended not to use this parameter and request new information elements to be added in the structure definition. Next releases of the T-Open API will not include support for this additionalData parameter because it has been detected that the extensibility function is not helping the stability of the standard definition of APIs

agreement.description: A list of agreement references. An agreement represents a contract or arrangement, either written or verbal and sometimes enforceable by law, such as a service level agreement or a customer price agreement

billingAccount.description: Reference to the billing accounts that are associated to the product instance. This attribute is an array to allow scenarios where a product or service is shared for payment between different accounts

category.description: List of categories/subcategories allocated to the ticket, intended to allow segmentation. A product may belong to more than one category

characteristic.description: List of configurable characteristics of the product to instantiate or to modify

creatingOrder.description: Reference to the order which created the product instance in the server

description.description: Some text providing a user-friendly detailed description of the product instance

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the product instance detailed information (e.g.: productInventory/v1/products/{productId})

id.description: Unique Identifier within the server for the product instance reported

isBundle.description: Indicates if the product is a single entity (false) or if it is actually composed of subproducts itself (true)

isCustomerVisible.description: Indicates if the product is the product is visible by the customer (true) or not (false)

modifyingOrders.description: Reference to the orders that modified the product instance in the server

orderDate.description: The date when the product was created, when the order that triggered the product creation was registered

paymentMean.description: Reference to the type of payment mode to be used for the product or service

place.description: Used to define a place useful for the product (for example an installation site)

productOffering.description: Reference to the Offering Identifier within the product catalogue that includes the description of the product that has been created for the customer

productPrice.description: List of price models applied to the instantiated product

productRelationship.description: Used to define subproducts composing a bundled product or products already owned by the customer but with a relationship with the one instantiated in the inventory

productSerialNumber.description: Any commercial code string that can be used for internal accounting to uniquely identify the product. It is the serial number for the product. This is typically applicable to tangible products

productSpec.description: Reference to the Product specification in the product catalogue that provides the description of the characteristics that define the configuration of the product instance

productType.description: Indication of the type of product instance registered. Supported values are implementation and application specific

publicId.description: Public number associated to the product (e.g.: use of an msisdn to refer to a subscription to a mobileline product)

realizingResource.description: Reference to the resources that are created/associated as part of the instantiation of the product

relatedObject.description: List of Objects or resources associated to an order (e.g.: framework agreement, opportunity, â€¦)

relatedParty.description: List of individuals (e.g.: support agent, system impacted, reviewer, â€¦) associated to the order

startDate.description: The date from which the product must start providing service

status.description: The status to which the product is set

subStatus.description: Substatus in order to define a second status level

tags.description: ist of freely defined strings that tag the product based on some criteria. This can be used by consumer application to define presentation logic

terminationDate.description: The date when the product will stop providing service

additionalData.description: Any further information needed by the server to fill the product ref definition (implementation and application specific) in the form of name-value pairs. It is recommended not to use this parameter and request new information elements to be added in the structure definition. Next releases of the T-Open API will not include support for this additionalData parameter because it has been detected that the extensibility function is not helping the stability of the standard definition of APIs

category.description: A class defining the type of product instantiated (the category allocated to the product specification that defines the instantiated product). A product may belong to more than one class

characteristic.description: List of specific product parameters configured for the product instance associated to an account

description.description: Some text providing a user-friendly detailed description of the product instance

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the product instance detailed information (e.g.: /productinventory/v1/products/{productId})

id.description: Unique Identifier within the server (product inventory) for the product instance that is associated to an account

place.description: Used to define a place useful for the product (for example a delivery geographical place). It is an array because a given product could be delivered in different places, for instance if the quantity is more than 1, and/or it can be associated to different places, on for delivery and another one for installation

productPrice.description: List of price models applied to the instantiated product

productRelationship.description: Used to define subproducts composing a bundled product or products already owned by the customer but with a relationship with the one included in the order

productSpec.description: Reference to the Product specification in the product catalogue that provides the description of the characteristics that define the configuration of a product associated to an account

productType.description: Indication of the type of product instance registered. Supported values are implementation and application specific

publicId.description: Public number associated to the product (e.g.: use of an msisdn to refer to a subscription to a mobileline product)

relatedParty.description: List of individuals (e.g.: user, â€¦) associated to a product instance

startDate.description: The date from which the product must start providing service

tags.description: ist of freely defined strings that tag the product based on some criteria. This can be used by consumer application to define presentation logic

terminationDate.description: The date when the product will stop providing service

amount.description: Current number of units set for the quantity

maximum.description: Maximum number of units allowed for the quantity

minimum.description: Minimum number of units allowed for the quantity

units.description: Definition of the units used for the quantity (number of licenses, minutes, Megabytes, â€¦). Implementation specific

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the related object detailed information

involvement.description: Indication of the relationship defined between the object and the product reported (e.g.: disputed invoice, adjusted invoice, related product, opportunity, framework agreeement,â€¦). Supported values are implementation and application specific

reference.description: String providing identification of the related object reported (an id or a name)

validFor.description: The validity for the relation with the related object. If not included, the current date is used as starting date and no ending date is defined

@referredType.description: Indicates the type of the resource referenced for extensibility/polimorphic purposes of the specific entity (individual/organization for customer, urban/rural for address, ...)

description.description: Text describing the referred related party

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the related party detailed information

id.description: String providing identification of the related party reported

name.description: String providing the name of the related party reported

nationalId.description: To obtain the list of products matching to a given legal identification value. Typically used combined with nationalIdType

nationalIdType.description: To obtain the list of products matching to a given legal identification type (e.g.: DNI, passport, social security number, RUC, CPF, driver's license, etc.). This is typically combined with nationalID to query for specific identity

role.description: Indication of the relationship defined between the related party and the order (e.g.: originator, customer, user, â€¦). Supported values are implementation and application specific

validFor.description: The validity for the relation with the related party. If not included, the current date is used as starting date and no ending date is defined

product.description: Definition of the related product (e.g.: the bundled subproduct)

type.description: A categorization of the relationship defined between the product referenced and the original entity (e.g.: subproduct, bundled, dependent,â€¦)

@type.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or specific object type)

name.description: Name of the product string characteristic

value.description: the value that the characteristic can take on as string

valueType.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or object type)

@type.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or specific object type)

name.description: First part of the textual descriptive characteristic

value.description: Second part of the textual descriptive characteristic

valueType.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or object type)

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending of the TimePeriod. If not included, then the period has no ending date

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting of the TimePeriod

@schemaLocation.description: This field provides a link to the schema describing the resource model for the Object defining the characteristics for a TV product

@type.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or specific object type)

valueType.description: type of characteristic information element, defines the format structure of the value information element (string or object type)

VoiceQuotaType.description: Voice quota information for mobile products

timeBands.description: Time bands when the quota applies

DataQuotaType.description: Data quota information for mobile products

timeBands.description: Time bands when the quota applies

SmsQuotaType.description: SMS quota information for mobile products

timeBands.description: Time bands when the quota applies

MobileQuotaCharacteristicType.description: Value object for MobileQuota characteristic containing voice, data, and SMS quotas

InternetConnectionCharacteristicType.description: Value object for InternetConnection characteristic - structure TBD based on actual response

TvPackagesCharacteristicType.description: Value object for TvPackages characteristic - structure TBD based on actual response
